Key Arguments: The legislation threatens freedom of expression, a fundamental right.
The proposed powers are seen as a tool for political agendas, particularly from the left, to silence dissent.
The definition of 'harm' is overly broad and could encompass many aspects of life, leading to excessive control.
There is skepticism about the motivations behind the legislation, particularly regarding its connection to COVID misinformation.
Concerns about who will determine what constitutes 'truth' and the potential for abuse of power.
Main Themes: Broad and vague definitions of harm
Notable Quotes: Our Forebears died for this most basic of rights.
This proposed legislation blatantly removes our freedoms.
The list is reminiscent of much of the Left-Wing State Speech Laws already in place.
We must wake up. You who adjudicate on this submission must do the same, why, for the sake of our country.
